content: can i pull you for a knit on the terrace if you re a rabid love island uk viewer you might recognize the stripes on my original sample from the pillows on the terrace… no just me os adult to fit 21 5 - 23 5 head circumference 100 grams of sport or dk weight yarn is plenty to finish this project samples a and b were both made with cascade 220 sport in the following colorways sample a charcoal grey - jet ~ 15g - 49 yards 45 meters white - natural ~ 17g - 56 yards 51 meters dark pink - living coral ~ 15 g - 53 yards 48 meters light pink - rose cloud ~ 15 g - 53 yards 48 meters sample b - dark blue - navy ~ 28 g - 85 yards 78 meters light blue - soft heather ~ 30 g - 92 yards 84 meters needles and notions size us 3 3 25 mm 16 circular needle size us 6 4 0 mm 16 circular needle size us 6 4 0 mm dpns or circular needle for magic loop 4 stitch markers 1 unique to mark the bor tapestry needle to weave in ends decreases have charted and written instructions this pattern has not been professionally tech-edited please do not hesitate to reach out if you need any assistance with the instructions i will do my best to help you i would love to see your projects on ravelry or you can tag me on instagram at @oldehoeft
